item.title: CVE-2024-44012|2024-10-07T15:58:25.273Z -- wpdev33 -- wp%20newsletter%20subscription
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in wpdev33 WP Newsletter Subscription allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WP Newsletter Subscription: from n/a through 1.1.
